TopicTitle: Display driver stopped responding and has recovered

Articles.Content: On a few year old laptop (525m and i5 2430m) I'm having problems with my screen going black and a message saying 'Display driver stopped responding and has recovered' after 15ish minutes of playing. I've been having this problem for a few months and had no problems running the game (although on lower setting) when the game was earlier in development. Thanks to anyone who can help me out with this.
Eagle 707, please see the support stickies, and the next time this happens close KSP and post the game logs and your dxdiag here (use dropbox).
